description: Detects Commandlet names from well-known PowerShell exploitation frameworks
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali
name: Malicious PowerShell Commandlets - ProcessCreation
query: process.command_line.text:(*Add\-Exfiltration* OR *Add\-Persistence* OR *Add\-RegBackdoor* OR *Add\-RemoteRegBackdoor* OR *Add\-ScrnSaveBackdoor* OR *Check\-VM* OR *ConvertTo\-Rc4ByteStream* OR OR *Get\-VulnAutoRun* OR *Get\-VulnSchTask* OR *Gupt\-Backdoor* OR *HTTP\-Login* OR *Install\-ServiceBinary* OR *Install\-SSP* OR *Invoke\-ACLScanner* OR *Invoke\-ADSBackdoor* OR *Invoke\-AllChecks*
